text: Léa Hélène Seydoux-Fornier de Clausonne (born 1 July 1985) is a French actress. In 2013, she won the Palme d'Or prize at the Cannes Film Festival for the movie Blue Is the Warmest Colour. She is also known for her role as Bond girl Madeleine Swann in Spectre (2015), and reprise the role in No Time to Die (2021). ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:Actresses who played Bond girls
title: Léa Seydoux
